Hello, I'm Maciej.

I build things for the web

I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible, human-centered products at Upstatement.

About me

Hi, I'm Maciej - a full-stack developer currently based in Warsaw, Poland. During my carrier, I've experience working with many technologies and programming languages. However, what I liked the most was creating web applications, both on the frontend and backend side.

I'm a graduate of computer science with experience working with various technologies such as C#, ASP.NET MVC, Web API (C#), React, Angular, SharePoint Framework and Dynamics 365.
I am currently looking for a job where I could develop my interests and skills as front-end developer.

My current technology stack is:
React, Angular, CSS, HTML, SQL, C#
